sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react'; const Teams = () => { const [selectedTeam, setSelectedTeam] = useState(null); const [filterLeague, setFilterLeague] = useState('all'); const teams = [ { id: 1, name: 'Galatasaray', league: 'Süper Lig', position: 1, points: 45, logo: '🦁', color: 'bg-yellow-500', stats: { played: 18, won: 14, drawn: 3, lost: 1, goalsFor: 42, goalsAgainst: 12, goalDifference: 30 }, players: [ { name: 'Mauro Icardi', position: 'Forvet', goals: 12, assists: 5 }, { name: 'Wilfried Zaha', position: 'Kanat', goals: 8, assists: 7 }, { name: 'Dries Mertens', position: 'Orta Saha', goals: 6, assists: 9 }, { name: 'Sergio Oliveira', position: 'Orta Saha', goals: 4, assists: 6 } ] }, { id: 2, name: 'Fenerbahçe', league: 'Süper Lig', position: 2, points: 44, logo: '🦅', color: 'bg-yellow-400', stats: { played: 18, won: 14, drawn: 2, lost: 2, goalsFor: 45, goalsAgainst: 15, goalDifference: 30 }, players: [ { name: 'Edin Dzeko', position: 'Forvet', goals: 15, assists: 3 }, { name: 'Dusan Tadic', position: 'Kanat', goals: 7, assists: 12 }, { name: 'Fred', position: 'Orta Saha', goals: 3, assists: 8 }, { name: 'Sebastian Szymanski', position: 'Orta Saha', goals: 5, assists: 4 } ] }, { id: 3, name: 'Beşiktaş', league: 'Süper Lig', position: 3, points: 35, logo: '🦅', color: 'bg-black', stats: { played: 18, won: 10, drawn: 5, lost: 3, goalsFor: 28, goalsAgainst: 18, goalDifference: 10 }, players: [ { name: 'Cenk Tosun', position: 'Forvet', goals: 8, assists: 2 }, { name: 'Al-Musrati', position: 'Orta Saha', goals: 4, assists: 3 }, { name: 'Rachid Ghezzal', position: 'Kanat', goals: 5, assists: 4 }, { name: 'Valentin Rosier', position: 'Defans', goals: 2, assists: 5 } ] }, { id: 4, name: 'Trabzonspor', league: 'Süper Lig', position: 4, points: 32, logo: '🔴', color: 'bg-red-600', stats: { played: 18, won: 9, drawn: 5, lost: 4, goalsFor: 25, goalsAgainst: 20, goalDifference: 5 }, players: [ { name: 'Uğurcan Çakır', position: 'Kaleci', goals: 0, assists: 0 }, { name: 'Anastasios Bakasetas', position: 'Orta Saha', goals: 6, assists: 7 }, { name: 'Mahmoud Trezeguet', position: 'Kanat', goals: 7, assists: 3 }, { name: 'Enis Bardhi', position: 'Orta Saha', goals: 4, assists: 5 } ] } ]; const leagues = ['all', 'Süper Lig', 'Premier Lig', 'La Liga', 'Bundesliga']; return (

Takım Analizi

{/* League Filter */}

Lig Filtresi

{leagues.map((league) => ( ))}
{/* Teams Grid */}
{teams .filter(team => filterLeague === 'all' || team.league === filterLeague) .map((team) => (
setSelectedTeam(team)} >
{team.logo}

{team.name}

{team.league}
{team.position}
Sıra
{team.points}
Puan
))}
{/* Team Details */} {selectedTeam && (
{selectedTeam.logo}

{selectedTeam.name}

{selectedTeam.league}

{/* Team Stats */}
{selectedTeam.stats.played}

{/* Goals Stats */}
{selectedTeam.stats.goalsFor}
Atılan Gol
{selectedTeam.stats.goalsAgainst}
Yenen Gol
{selectedTeam.stats.goalDifference}

{/* Top Players */}

En İyi Oyuncular

{selectedTeam.players.map((player, index) => (
{player.name}
{player.position}
⚽ {player.goals} 🎯 {player.assists}
))}
)} {/* Action Buttons */}
); }; export default Teams;
